citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the report for the November 2022 semiannual evaluation was not signed by any of the IACUC
members. An IACUC functions to assess a research facility's animal program, facilities and procedures in order to ensure
animal welfare. The registrant shall ensure that a majority of the IACUC members review and sign the semiannual
reports. Correct by 28 April 2023.

At time of inspection, the registrant did not have documentation of training on the contingency plan for program
employees. Employees of the veterinary technician program must know their roles and responsibilities as outlined in the
contingency plan in order to ensure animal care and welfare in emergent events. The registrant must train personnel on
the contingency plan. Correct by 28 April 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
At time of inspection, the report for the November 2022 semiannual evaluation was not signed by any of the IACUC 
members.  An IACUC functions to assess a research facility's animal program, facilities and procedures in order to ensure 
animal welfare. The registrant shall ensure that a majority of the IACUC members review and sign the semiannual 
reports.  Correct by 28 April 2023. 
2.38(l)(3) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At time of inspection, the registrant did not have documentation of training on the contingency plan for program 
employees.  Employees of the veterinary technician program must know their roles and responsibilities as outlined in the 
contingency plan in order to ensure animal care and welfare in emergent events.  The registrant must train personnel on 
the contingency plan.  Correct by 28 April 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
